headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://accounts.google.com https://*.firebase.com https://*.firebaseio.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: https: blob:; font-src 'self' data: https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.supabase.co wss://*.supabase.co https://*.firebase.com https://*.firebaseio.com; frame-src 'self' https://accounts.google.com; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'
